description:
STARTED IT CAREER IN 2002

A seasoned professional with over a decade of rich experience in leading IT services delivery, Technical consulting and solution designing with mixed computing environment including, Hyper Converged Infrastructure, Software Defined Storage, OpenStack, Windows, Unix, Storage/Backup, VMware and Networks. I am a proactive self-starter known to initiate process and service improvement plans to increase systems, storage and team efficiency, and possess excellent communication and diagnostic skills. 

DESIGNING INFRASTRUCTURE SOLUTIONS & TECHNICAL CONSULTING

I engage in IT Infrastructure projects that include designing new solutions and technical consultation for improving existing infrastructure. Though my core area of expertise is Dell EMC Hyper Converged Infrastructure, Enterprise Storage and VMWare products, , I have good knowledge on Dell EMC  PowerFlex, Vxblock technologies, software defined storages and various Unix/Linux platforms. I own technical certifications from various domains – Cloud, Storage, SAN, VMware and Volume Manager.  

TECHNICAL LEAD & SYSTEM ADMINISTRATION

Prior to Senior Principal Engineer role, I was part of R&D Engineering Lab team supporting internal customers from various domains across the globe. I led a team of DTS (Deep Technical Support) engineers from Storage and VMWare domains. I handled various technologies such as EMC Symmetrix, Powermax(VMAX), VxBlock, XtremIO, Powerflex(ScaleIO), Clariion, VNX, and ViPR (Software-defined storage) ,  HP EVA, HP XP, Hitachi AMS, USPVM, Brocade and Cisco SAN.
